import React from 'react'; import "./Blog.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import DocumentMeta from "react-document-meta"; function ApplyMbbsInRussia() { const meta = { title: "How to Apply MBBS in Russia? Cost, College & Admission Procedure", description: "How to Apply MBBS in Russia? Total cost of MBBS in Russia, affordable fees and high-quality Medical Education, duration of MBBS in Russia, & admission to MBBS in Russia.", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/how-to-apply-mbbs-in-russia", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "How to Apply MBBS in Russia?", }, }, }; return (

How to Apply MBBS in Russia?

  • How much cost of MBBS in Russia
  • How many years to complete MBBS in Russia
  • Why MBBS Cheap in Russia?
  • Is doing MBBS in Russia Good?

MBBS is one of the most preferred places among medical students to pursue MBBS. The process to take admission to Russia for MBBS is very easy. Every year a large number of international students take admission to study MBBS in Russia and of which the maximum number of students are from India.

Indian students do not need to qualify for any entrance exam to take admission to Russian Medical Universities. MBBS degree from Russia is recognized in India because Russian medical Universities are approved by MCI and WHO. The cost of MBBS in Russia is comparatively lower than the private medical colleges of India. The top medical colleges of Russia provide an MBBS course in the English language.

{/* */}

How much cost of MBBS in Russia

Below are the most chosen universities for MBBS in Russia by Indian students:

Russian medical universities with low cost of MBBS in Russia (range from 2.50 lakhs to 3.5 lakhs per year):

  • Bashkir State Medical University
  • Orel State Medical University
  • Altai State Medical University
  • Crimea State Medical University
  • Ulyanovsk State University
  • Mari State Medical University

Russian medical universities with fees of MBBS in Russia (range from 3.50 lakhs to 6 lakhs per year):

  • Kazan Federal University
  • Volgograd State Medical University
  • Kursk State Medical University
  • Orenburg State Medical University
  • Saint Petersburg State Medical University
  • Pirogov Russian National Research Medical University

How many years to complete MBBS in Russia

The duration of MBBS course in Russia is 6 years. The students that opt to study MBBS in Russia do not need to give one year of the preparatory course prior to starting the medical course. Medical Education in Russia also offers an opportunity for 1 year of internship. Most of the students choose Russia to pursue MBBS because of the higher standard of education, practical knowledge, and reasonable fees.

Why MBBS Cheap in Russia?

Russia is one of the most popular destinations for higher studies among the Indian students because of highly subsidized fee by Russian Ministry of Health & Education as compared to other western countries. Every year, more than 3,000 Indian students take admission in top Russian medical universities.

Is doing MBBS in Russia Good?

Russia is a preferable destination to study MBBS for Indian students because of its quality education and reasonable fee structure. The medium of instruction in Russian Medical Universities is English as well as Russian. After completing the MBBS degree from Russia and if Indian students give FMGE/MCI screening test, they are eligible to practice medicine in India. The students can take direct admission to MBBS in Russia without any entrance exam. Each Russian Medical University is listed in WHO and MCI so the students that get an MBBS degree from Russia can practice anywhere in the world including India.

The students get a fully furnished hostel facility inside the university campus with fresh and quality Indian food as well. MBBS students can also get a scholarship if they fulfill the scholarship criteria. The students get training for MCI screening test during the medical course and professors are well aware about the MCI screening test. The students pursuing MBBS in Russia also get training to learn Russian Language so that they can communicate with patients in the hospital during the time of medical practice.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience. He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget. ✔3500+ Students ✔15 Countries ✔MBBS, MBA, PG, UG ✔100% Commitment ✔Education Loan ✔Job Placements
) } export default ApplyMbbsInRussia;
